channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A’s Mega Dimension DLC is more of the same — for better and worse
item.description: I loved Pokémon Legends: Z-A, but a couple hours into Mega Dimension DLC I’m disappointed for 2 big reasons.

item.title: Columbia goes full Endor for its latest Star Wars collaboration — and we spoke to the team behind it
item.description: Columbia Sportswear's annual Star Wars collection is here, and for 2025, it's the Endor Collection with several standout pieces, including a Poncho styled after Leia and Luke, and a Han Solo-themed Interchange Jacket.

item.title: Google’s answer to the AI arms race — promote the guy behind its data center tech
item.description: Amin Vahdat has been promoted to chief technologist for AI infrastructure, a newly created position reporting directly to CEO Sundar Pichai.

item.title: Microsoft finally realizes the threat SteamOS poses — but its promises to fix Windows 11 for PC gaming are too little, too late
item.description: Microsoft just doesn’t get PC gamers and its plans to fix Windows 11 won’t stop the rise of SteamOS.

item.title: State attorneys general warn Microsoft, OpenAI, Google, and other AI giants to fix ‘delusional’ outputs
item.description: The letter demanded companies institute new safeguards to keep users safe from harmful psychological impacts.

item.title: 64% of Teens Say They Use AI Chatbots as Mental Health Concerns Mount
item.description: The teens just love ChatGPT. Does OpenAI love them back?
